summary: Worker initialization fails with 'TypeError: otel.setSpan is not a function' when running the hello world sample application. The error occurs in the tracing module during worker startup and is caused by an OpenTelemetry dependency version incompatibility.
userImpact: Users following the getting started guide cannot run the hello world sample, blocking initial setup and evaluation of the SDK.
rootCause: OpenTelemetry library broke semantic versioning, causing API incompatibility between @temporalio/worker and its otel dependency.
proposedFix: Updated temporalio to 0.2.2 and @temporalio/worker to 0.4.0 which fix the issue.
resolutionDetails: Patch releases (temporalio@0.2.2, @temporalio/worker@0.4.0) were cut to fix the OpenTelemetry semver breakage.
keyQuote: This has already been fixed in the main branch. Looks like opentelemetry broke semver.
